intro: Adenostemum nitidum, commonly known as the smooth adenostemum, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes milkweeds and related species. The plant is characterized by its smooth, often succulent stems and opposite, lance-shaped leaves. Its flowers are typically yellow or orange, with five petals and a prominent central column. It is often found in disturbed habitats and can be invasive in certain regions.
